item.text: The Lord spoke to Moses,

“<st data-num="07200" class="">See</st>, I have <st data-num="07121 08034" class="">chosen</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01212" class="">Bezalel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0221" class="">Uri</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02354" class="">Hur</st>, of the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>,

and I have <st data-num="04390" class="">filled</st> him with the <st data-num="07307" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st><n id="1" /> in <st data-num="02451" class="">skill</st>,<n id="2" /> in <st data-num="08394" class="">understanding</st>, in <st data-num="01847" class="">knowledge</st>, and in <st data-num="03605" class="">all kinds of</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="04399" class="">craftsmanship</st>,

to <st data-num="02803" class="">make</st> <st data-num="04284" class="">artistic designs</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="06213" class="">work</st> with <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, with <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, and with <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>,

and with <st data-num="02799" class="">cutting</st> and <st data-num="04390" class="">setting</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st>, and with <st data-num="02799" class="">cutting</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, to <st data-num="06213" class="">work</st> in <st data-num="03605" class="">all kinds of</st> <st data-num="04399" class="">craftsmanship</st>.

<st data-num="02009" class="">Moreover</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> have also <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> him <st data-num="0171" class="">Oholiab</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0294" class="">Ahisamach</st>, of the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st>, and I have <st data-num="05414 03820" class="">given</st> <st data-num="02451" class="">ability</st> to <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03820" class="">specially</st> <st data-num="02450" class="">skilled</st>,<n id="2" /> that they may <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> I have <st data-num="06680" class="">commanded</st> you:

the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>, the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of the <st data-num="05715" class="">testimony</st>, the <st data-num="03727" class="">atonement lid</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> it, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03627" class="">furnishings</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st>,

the <st data-num="07979" class="">table</st> with its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>, the <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="04501" class="">lampstand</st> with <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>, the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> of <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>,

the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> for the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st> with <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>, the large <st data-num="03595" class="">basin</st> with its <st data-num="03653" class="">base</st>,

the <st data-num="08278" class="">woven</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st>, the <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st> for <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> and the <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st> for his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, to <st data-num="03547" class="">minister as priests</st>,
the anointing oil, and sweet incense for the Holy Place. They will make all these things just as I have commanded you.”
The Lord said to Moses,
“Tell the Israelites, ‘Surely you must keep my Sabbaths, for it is a sign between me and you throughout your generations, that you may know that I am the Lord who sanctifies you.

So you must <st data-num="08104" class="">keep</st> the <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbath</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> for you. Everyone who <st data-num="02490" class="">defiles</st> it<n id="1" /> must <st data-num="04191" class="">surely</st> be <st data-num="04191" class="">put to death</st>; <st data-num="03588" class="">indeed</st>,<n id="2" /> if <st data-num="03605" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">does</st><n id="3" /> any<n id="4" /> <st data-num="04399" class="">work</st> on it, then <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">person</st> will be <st data-num="03772" class="">cut off</st> from <st data-num="07130" class="">among</st> his<n id="5" /> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.
Six days work may be done, but on the seventh day is a Sabbath of complete rest, holy to the Lord; anyone who does work on the Sabbath day must surely be put to death.

The <st data-num="01121 03478" class="">Israelites</st> must <st data-num="08104" class="">keep</st> the <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbath</st> by <st data-num="06213" class="">observing</st> the <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbath</st> throughout their <st data-num="01755" class="">generations</st> as a <st data-num="05769" class="">perpetual</st> <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st>.
It is a sign between me and the Israelites forever; for in six days the Lord made the heavens and the earth, and on the seventh day he rested and was refreshed.’”
He gave Moses two tablets of testimony when he had finished speaking with him on Mount Sinai, tablets of stone written by the finger of God.
